package.name: mower_map_msgs
package.description:
Map-related message and service definitions for OpenMower.
Contains: - MapArea message for defining mowing areas with obstacles - Services for adding/getting mowing areas - Services for setting/getting docking and navigation points - Services for clearing map data
Ported from open_mower_ros (ROS1) to ROS2.
package.author: Clemens Elflein
